body:
So.... I was thinking of challenges to do on Avicus, like killing or getting the monument.. Something that involves that.. So here i bring you............ A challenge of some sort....  If you lie and say you completed a challenge, your only tricking yourself!

"Bare Handed":                                             Week 1:
 
Rules: CANNOT use a weapon, use your fist. CANNOT knock them into void with your fist, CANNOT count unless opponet fights back with a weapon of some sort. CAN, use any armor. CAN kill by hand, or lava, water, fall damage, of any kind. OPPONENT has to have AT LEAST, Leather armor. YOU have 162 hours to complete this week's challenge..

Good luck!                    Challenge rating: HARD/INSANE

""                                                                        Week 2:

title: Avicus Challenges  (Week 1)
